document.full_text: uncle mo earned his 2-year-old championship last year by being breathtaking, but at the wood memorial, in the first defeat in his career, he simply looked ordinary.
document.title: on horse racing: from uncle mo show to wide-open kentucky derby
lines_and_colors: uncle mo earned his 2-year-old championship last year by being breathtaking, but at the wood memorial, in the first defeat in his career, he simply looked ordinary.
